description: Try our easy to follow Thai Green Curry Paste recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Green curry,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Thai Green Curry Paste Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 3 tbs coriander, root and stems, chopped
1 tsp coriander seeds (or 2 tsp ground coriander)
1 tsp cumin seeds (or 2 tsp ground cumin)
1 stem lemongrass, white part only, sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Place all ingredients in the bowl of a small food processor and process for 2-3 minutes, scraping down the side of the bowl occasionally, until a finely chopped paste forms.
